p: Sample A10 and A21 showed optimal stability at room temperature, evaluated at different time points, for a total storage period of six months. As reported in Figure 8, the size of the oil droplets remained almost unchanged, confirming the thermodynamic stability of these systems. In particular, S10 has Z-average and PDI values of 177.9 nm and 0.173, respectively, while S21 has Z-average and PDI values of of 138.4 nm and 0.245, respectively.
